topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b0759263687234ed0009de#post_55b0759263687234ed0009de
It's not even the L and R thing. They pronounce with a short U sound instead of a long one.
The say it as "Luh-fee" when it's SUPPOSED to be "Loo-fee"
